text: Ithi, Oh Bantu bencwadi! Animile phezulu kwalutho kuze kube nenza ngendlela eyala ngayo iTora neVangeli nalokho okwehliselwa phansi kunina (iQurâ€™an) okuvela eNkosini yenu futhi ngempela lokho okwembulwa kuwena okuvela eNkosini yakho kuyokwandisa eningini labo ukona nokungakholwa ngakho-ke ungaphatheki kabi ngenxa yabantu abangakholwa
